class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.common.domain.LabelPrintJob
class.sql-query: select u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email_address, cp.short_title, site.name, count(ji.identifier) as prints from os_label_print_job_items ji inner join os_label_print_jobs j on j.identifier = ji.job_id inner join catissue_specimen s on s.identifier = ji.item_id inner join catissue_collection_protocol cp on cp.identifier = s.collection_protocol_id inner join catissue_specimen_coll_group v on v.identifier = s.specimen_collection_group_id inner join catissue_site site on site.identifier = v.site_id inner join catissue_user u on u.identifier = j.submitted_by where j.item_type = 'specimen' and j.submission_date >= :startDate and j.submission_date <= :endDate group by u.first_name, u.last_name, u.email_address, cp.short_title, site.name
